award_title: FW-HTF-R: Fostering Learning and Adaptability of Future Manufacturing Workers with Intelligent Extended Reality (IXR)
subject: When your ML stack can't be fully shared
body:
ML pipelines with XR hardware dependencies and proprietary manufacturing data are nightmares for reproducibilityâ€”even if you document everything perfectly, no one has your exact setup or data access.

I built Ouro to make computational methods discoverable and reusable even when the full stack can't be shared. It helps demonstrate real-world accessibility of your work beyond "code available upon request."

Quick chat after the holidays?

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
